_xResult.title: Off the Mark Jumpsuit
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made wrap jumpsuit with tie
_xResult.longdesc:
Step out in style! Summer calls for linen, and summer fun calls for a stylish go-anywhere jumpsuit from Teyxo.

 

Comfortable and sophisticated, you can top it with a jacket for work or dress it up with fun accessories for a sunset beach party. The wrap front ties on one side, and an elastic back waist accommodates movement and comfort. The flared wide leg bottoms look great with flats or heels and its washed natural linen fabric will last for years.

 

This is a very versatile wardrobe piece. Since it's made to your body measurements, you'll know it fits perfectly!
